inn1.comm: aha, slowness already. Gambhir is looking to dab it for a single, but the ball arives late and takes the inside edge. It hits the pad, and they still take the single even as the ball doesn't even roll off the pitch

Rahane gets a golden duck on return to international cricket. This time it's the lack of bounce. Short of a length, starts outside off, sneaks under his defence, and hits him midway between shin and knee. Dead plumb, as this is moving in from outside off and hitting middle

Slowness and lowness. Chennai is up to it again. Roach on a hat-trick. Patel is looking to dab it for the single that gets him off the mark. It's short of a length, angling away. Patel is early into the shot, and the ball stays low for good measure. The inside edge is taken, and the stumps are disturbed
he stays short of a length and straight, but Tiwary is well forward to counter any low bounce, and defends solidly

Tiwary is frozen. This is dug in short, and he is slow to react. He half-ducks, hoping it bounces over, but this pitch doesn't have that much bounce. The ball hits the gloves, and lobs up for a single to leg
short of a length, angling across, pushed to point
length ball outside off, Tiwary is well forward in defence again
Tiwary is pushing forward to almost every ball, and push-drives this length ball between Russell and mid-off. All along the ground
lovely fielding. This is driven on the up, inside out, and seems like it will burst past mid-off. Powell, though, dives full length to his left to save four runs
short of a length now, defended off the front foot by Tiwary
guides this between point and cover-point with an open face
length ball, angling into the pads, flicked away, but can't beat square leg
length ball outside off, pushed between cover and square cover for a single
short of a length, angling away, steered away to third man for one
short of a length, just outside off, Tiwary is behind it in defence
pushed away from the body, to the left of Pollard at point who seems to have hurt his left hand while diving
digs this half way, gets it to bounce only rib high. Well down the leg side, beating his attempt at a weakish shot. Not called a wide because Tony Hill thinks it has touched the arm sleeve on the way
short of a length, into the body, tucked away for a single past square leg
worked away off the pads for a single
stays low, but angling too far down leg, and is worked away for a single
looks to drive, away from the body, can't do so on such a slow pitch. Ends up pushing this to cover
slower ball, too full, pushed for an easy single into the covers
short of a length, outside off, gets behind it to defend it to cover
slower ball, on the pads, plays the flick with soft hands, finds square leg
short of a length, on the pads, tucked away for an easy single
short of a length, holds its line around off, squares him up a touch, and the thick edge goes past the two slips
length ball, around off, pushed to cover, no single available
appeal for lbw as this length ball hits him in front of stumps. Since there is no swing, this can't have pitched inside the line of the stumps
short of a length, on the pads, can't beat the man at square leg
beats square leg this time, and gets a couple of runs. What's more, this is a no-ball
slower ball, and Gambhir doesn't even get a touch on it because this has scooted along the ground. Bounces three times before reaching the keeper
short of a length, outside off, can't beat point
angling into the pads, MT misses on the flick but takes the leg-bye
short of a length, outside off, dabs it for a single behind square
slower ball, Tiwary reads it, recovers well, and opens the face on it, and Ramdin does even better with a dive to his right
the regulation pace, and he picks it off the pads for a single to fine leg
tapped away past backward point for another single
first four for Gambhir, second of the innings. It's a length ball outside off, he stays in the crease, and drives it between cover and extra cover

speaking of value for shots, this one gets some value because of the pace on it. It's a full toss outside off, takes the outside edge, bounces between the stumps and keeper, and beats Ramdin to his left
length ball outside off, driven to cover
full, near yorker, into the pads, Gambhir digs it out for a single. Second no-ball from Roach
no, he bowls a fast half-volley on the pads. Yorker gone wrong. And Tiwary whips it through midwicket, past the diving long-on, for four
full outside off, driven to point where Martin fields. Not sure if Pollard is back on the field
length ball outside off, takes a thick edge past slip for a single
flighted around off, defended off the front foot
offbreak outside off, Tiwary leans into the drive, and places it to the left of mid-off. Lovely shot
flicks this offbreak to leg, to short midwicket
length ball, turning into his pads, pushed to square leg
holds the line, this is the other one, pitches middle and leg and straightens. Defended back to him
length ball on the pads, flicked to square leg
length ball on off, driven to short cover
short of a length, angled across him, dabbed to third man for a single
lenght ball outside off, driven with an open face, past point
angling into the pads, worked away to fine leg
walks down to this length ball, and is still early into the drive, and gets an inside edge onto the pad
looks to dab this behind square but the ball stays low, and he can't get it off the pitch
flighted outside off, Tiwary pushes forward to defend the offbreak
Tiwary charges down the wicket, Narine bowls the other one, Tiwary has to play the defensive shot
Nearly. Tiwary tries the pull, not the shot advisable on slow wickets. And this one isn't short either. Almost played on
angling into the pads, hits them, and travels fine of short fine leg
turning sharply into the pads, worked around the corner, Gambhir wants the single, but Tiwary sends him back even though this is Gambhir's call
full and straight, pushed to mid-on
length ball, around off, pushed off the front foot to cover
slower delivery, stumps to stumps, defended to cover
length ball into the pads, pushed to square leg
slower ball, gives him the width, steered to third man, and Tiwary reaches his highest score in ODIs
shimmies down the track and heaves it into the leg side for a single
short of a length, outside off, guided to third man for one
full on the pads, worked away for a single
short of a length, offbreak, defended outside off
pitched outside leg, turning towards the stumps, worked to midwicket
picked away off the pads for a single
plays this offbreak against the turn, takes it from just outside off, places it wide of point for a single
outside leg again, turning towards the stumps, played fine for a single
tucked away off the pads for a single
length ball outside off, played with an open face for a single
length ball, pitched outside leg, Gambhir plants the front foot down and tries the heave, but is beaten
short of a length, just outside off, opens the face on this for a single

fuller now, and Tiwary capitalises on it. Anything full has to go on this pitch. Tiwary strides forward and pushes at it with a straight bat. Times it really well, and it goes between Sammy and mid-on
gets a little width, and guides it to third man for one
flighted around off, turning in, defended to leg
quicker delivery, on the pads, holds its line, worked away to leg for a single
shortish, turning away, punched to deep cover for one
flighted on off, turning in, defended to square leg
appeal for lbw as he beats the forward defensive with sharp turn. It has pitched outside off, hit him in front of leg, and has to be turning down
overpitched, driven down to long-on for one
angling into the pads, worked away for a single
length ball, middle and leg, worked to square leg, and they don't run despite a misfield
this is improvisation. Presses forward and across, and flicks this from outside off. All along the ground, and past midwicket
short of a length, outside off, left alone
taken from outside off, the inside edge goes to fine leg for one
slower ball, on a length, outside off, driven to deep point for one
short of a good length outside off, turns away sharply, guided towards point
shortish outside leg, turns in, worked away in front of square for a single
turning in from a good length outside off, turns the face on that one and plays it to square leg
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and works it to midwicket
stretches forward, this one went the other way, tapped towards cover
pushes that one gently in front of cover for a single
angling in towards middle, pitched it on a length, drives it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, worked off the back foot towards square leg
short outside off, cuts it straight to point
flighted on the off, plenty of air on that on, drives it back to the bowler, another dot
keeps this flat, on middle, makes room and drives it to cover
quicker through the air, flat on the off stump, defended towards point and races through for a single
flighted on middle, tickled into the leg side for an easy single
angling on middle from round the wicket, drove it inside out towards deep cover for one more
pushed back towards the bowler
gets to the pitch and drives it along the ground for a single to long-on
stepped out of the crease, took it off a length and drove it hard past extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
floated it on middle, much slower through the air, no turn, drives it down the ground for a single to long-on
pushed into the off side towards extra cover
mid-on is up and Tiwary went after that one, was pitched up and he just chipped it wide of mid-on for a couple of runs
short on the off, punches it towards Pollard at point, no single on offer there
the attempted googly, went straight on instead, got an inside edge as he tried to ppen the face on that one
eased that one past cover, bowled flat on middle, for a single

that looked out, bowled it flat and it was quicker through the air and went straight on, landed on middle, kept a touch low as well, Gambhir got across and tried to work it square but missed, trapped right in front, no doubt about that at all
flighted outside off, flicked to long-on for one
short outside off, Kohli off the mark with a punch to long-on
flighted outside off, Tiwary reaches fifty with a drive to long-on, and refuses to stop kissing the helmet. Important innings for Tiwary who has had a rough initiation into international cricket
short, but stays low, and Kohli has to be quick in order to manage to pull this to deep midwicket
overpitched, driven to long-on
turning into the pads, worked away for an easy single. One of the better overs for India, with six fairly easy singles
overpitched on the pads, driven to long-off for one
smart shot. He sees the mid-on is inside the circle,presses forward and lofts this length ball from around off, over that mid-on
legbreak outside off, defended to cover
quick delivery around off, defended back
looks to back-cut this, but the ball stays low and takes the bottom edge Bounces over Ramdin's head, but they can't take the single
full and straight, driven to long-on for one
short of a length, outside off, pushed to midwicket

quick length ball into the pads, defended to midwicket, but Pollard has dived on the ball. He is in pain. He has landed on the ball. The impact is in the stomach/ribs area. First the knee, now this. Not a good day for Pollard
overpitched on the pads, quick too, can't beat square leg
slows this one down, turning into the pads, bunts this between square leg and midwicket for one
short of a length, played with soft hands, gets a single to cover
length ball outside off, uses the pace on it, guides it past short third man for one
straight length ball, defended to cover
slightly shorter, punched down to long-on for one
looks for the paddle sweep from outside off, can't beat short fine leg
trties another fine sweep from well outside off. Beaten. Kohli pushes for a leg-bye. Tiwary is late to go, but makes it in time. A driect hit would have got him
pitched up outside off, driven to sweeper-cover for one
short of a length, pushed to sweeper-cover for a single
flighted outside off, turning in, defended to cover
looks to flick this to leg, can't beat short midwicket
quick on the pads, misfielded by Sammy at square leg to allow him a single
tossed up outside off, defended watchfully
quicker one, on the pads, flicked past square leg, to the right of deep midwicket, comes back for two
short of a  length, just outside off, punched back to him
chipped away, nicely done too. Not trying to hit a six, just trying to clear the bowler. Obviously it doesn't carry to long-on
length ball, around off, defended to cover
straighter and quicker, defended back to him
Run-out opportunity. He has pushed this to the right of point, takes the fielder on, and just makes it despite a direct hit. No plonking of the bat, sliding it all the way
length ball, middle and leg, pushed between cover and extra cover
shortish, outside off, punches this to long-off
nicely played. Quick and short of a length, punched behind square for a couple
overpitched, driven easily for a single to long-on
shimmies down, sees a quicker ball, and plays a defensive shot to short midwicket
slower through the air, pushed to square leg, and they steal another single. These two guys are running really well
quicker ball, into the pads, defended to mid-on
offbreak, turning into the pads, pushed a little too hard to square leg to be taking a single
length ball on the pads, turning towards middle, defended to midwicket
flatter, quicker, punched to deep cover for one
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-off for a single
cross-batted but nicely played. Short of a length, quick, outside off, Tiwary lofts it over short midwicket, the only fielder he needs to clear for this shot
plays the paddle sweep now, fine of fine leg, comes back for a couple
another paddle sweep, this time from outside off, and even finer than the previous one, and beats fine leg. Tiwary is playing a lovely innings on this slow and low pitch
flicked, but can't beat midwicket
suddenly a glut of boundaries. Quick, short of a length, Kohli goes back and punches this in front of square. Beats deep point
turning into the pads, worked way for a single around the corner
turning into the pads, pushed to square leg
fired into the pads, misses out, but takes a leg-bye
another quick ball down leg, worked around the corner
length ball on off, defended off the front foot
short of a length, middle and off, punched down to long-on for one
length ball on off, pushed to the left of cover, and they turn down the single despite a fumble from Sammy
short of a length, on off, pushed to the left of cover for a single
takes this shortish delivery from outside off, flicks this to the left of fine leg, and takes a second
again moves inside the line to guide this square on the on side for a single
turning into the pads, worked away fine for a single
fired down the leg side. Ramdin waits for Tiwary to overbalance. In vain
clears midwicket again. He is picking that gap superbly. Shimmies down a little to get close to the pitch of this, and then chips it over
turning into the pads, worked away for a single to leg
short of a length, outside off, punched down the ground
slower but short still, and he opens the face on it for a single
driven down to long-on for an easy single
slower short ball, Kohli waits for it, and pulls this in front of square for another four. West Indies are bleeding in these middle overs
short of a length, on off, pushed to the right of cover for one
short of a length, on off, guided behind square on the leg side
length ball outside off, driven to deep point for one
slower ball, outside off, steered to third man
length ball, angling into the pads, driven to long-on for one
length ball outside off, driven straight to cover
slower ball, on off, flicked, but can't beat midwicket
slower full toss, driven to long-off for one
pitched up, outside off, flicked to leg for one
wide down the leg side, and Ramdin is lazy in getting there. Allows an extra run
would have been another wide had he not helped this along to fine leg
length ball outside off, stays back to punch this to long-on
this length ball holds its line outside off and stays low too. Beats his drive, squeezing under the bat
gets a thick edge on this drive, takes the single to third man
short of a length, around off, opens the face, gets a single
length ball, into the pads, placed to the left of fine leg, and hares back for the second
overpitched on the pads, flicked to deep square for one
full on the pads again, worked away for another easy single
pushed straight to short cover, and they steal a single. A good example of alert running and lax fielding
goes wide of the crease, Kohli waits for the slower one to arrive, and then opens the face
slower legcutter, opens the face, Martin fumbles at point, allows them an easy single
slower ball, half-volley outside off, driven in front of square, beats deep point. A wristy cover drive
full again, but this time he goes down the ground and takes the single to long-off
length ball, angling in towards middle, pushed back to Pollard
slower ball, would have been wide had he not punched this to cover
full outside off, drives at it, but can't beat point
punched wide of point this time, gets a couple because he has placed it to the left of the deep man
short of a length, hit back to Sammy
half chance for a return catch. Kolhi looks to flick this to long=on, from outside off. Gets the leading edge that eludes Sammy to his left
slower ball outside off, pushed back to Sammy
flighted offbreak, flicked to midwicket
short of a length, turning in, placed to deep midwicket to reach yet another fifty. Acknowledges the applause from all corners
top shot. Goes inside out against a length ball offbreak. Clears mid-off with ease. His highest List A score. Hundred-run stand too. They knock gloves
bunts this into the on side for a single
the other one from Narine, Kohli reads it, and pushes it to cover for one
the legbreak again, didn't seem to have read it, defended square on the leg side
length ball, pushed towards long-on for one
short of a length, squared up a touch, gets a single to point
full toss on the pads, finds deep square leg
length ball, outside off, driven wide of cover, gets the 99th run. He is cramping up again
length ball into the pads, worked away to deep square
length ball outside off, pushed to short cover. Can't risk quick singles now
legbreak from Narine, pushed back to him. Read it off the pitch
another legbreak, starts around leg, pushed to short midwicket
quicker one, on the pads, gets a single to cover, brings Tiwary back on strike

what a ball to get on 99. Tiwary laps it up. Legnth ball, outside leg, turning down, glanced away. Removes the helmet immediately. This is enough to forget all the cramps. Such delight for him. He has had a wretched unfortunate start to his career, but now also has an ODI hundred, his first in List A cricket. Kohli comes and hugs him

takes a single, pushing it wide of point, and walks off - he is retired-hurt here. No obvious communication with the opposition captain or the umpire. I am sure he would have got that message during the drinks break, to not carry on if he thinks the cramps are troubling him too much
length ball on the pads, worked away for a single
full, middle and off, driven to long-on
length ball outside off, pushed to point
overpitched outside off, driven between mid-off and extra cover. That shot is enough to tell you the man is in form
length ball, can't beat cover field with this one
slower one from Roach, early into this, can't beat cover
runs this down to third man for a single
accurate legbreak, short of driving length, defended off the back foot
short of a length again, punched to long-off for one
quick, on the pads, pushed to extra cover
sets back for this short-of-a-length delivery, and pulls it over midwicket
this short ball doesn't come on, he has to abort the cut, and place it in front of square for one
this one stops at him, Sharma plays it early, but Martin picks it on the half-volley
length ball outside off, pushed to deep cover for one
full outside off, can't beat cover with the drive
short of a length, bunted to cover with soft hands, takes the single
length ball, on the pads, flicked past the diving midwicket, gets a couple wide of long-on
yorker on off, plays it nicely with an open face, but can't beat point
short of a length, angling in, worked away to deep square for one
flighted around middle and leg, defended off the front foot
length ball on off, driven to extra cover
quickish, on the pads, pushed to the right of Martin. Fielded by him
drives this inside-out from leg-stump line, gets a single to long-off
short of a length, pushed to the left of cover, gets a single
flighted on middle and off, driven to long-off for another single
short of a length, into the pads, whipped away for a single
length ball, too straight, picked away for a single
what a shot. Shot of the day so far. Short of a length, on middle and off, and he punches this square, using his wrists to impart the power. Beats point
goes down the ground with this one, but can't beat Sammy
length ball, pushed to midwicket, Kohli tumbles as he tries to slide the bat in. Actually the bat got stuck in the boot of Sammy who was there to collect the throw
short of a length, outside off, played into the leg side, but can't beat midwicket
hit down to long-on for a single
length ball, on off, pushed to the right of point
driven to the right of cover for one
length ball on the pads, worked around the corner for a single
length ball on the pads, pushed with an open face to point
length ball on off, punched down to long-off for a single
offbreak, turning into the pad, worked away for a single
worked past midwicket for a single
short of a length, pushed to the left of cover for a single
shortish, wide, punched away to deep point for one
legbreak, starts middle and leg, worked away for another single
overpitched on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
Kohli is gone. Looking to hit a six over long-on, but Martin sort of cramps him up with the leg line. He can't free the arms, and is too close to the ball, hence no elevation. easy catch for long-on
length ball on the pads, pushed back to him
driven to long-off for one
full on the pads, worked wide of square leg for a single
quick on the pads, flicked to deep square for one
pushed straight to cover, sent back, and he has to dive back in. The throw is high anyway
pushed down to long-off for one
short of a length, on the pads, worked square on the leg side for one
legbreak. Starts outside off, Sharma seems to have read it off the pitch, guides it past short third. martin gives frantic chase, and keeps it in
quick, on the pads, pulled to deep square
length ball, on the pads, pushed to the right of the bowler
he has not been reading the legbreaks from the hand, and has been beaten now. Short of a length, within the stumps, and takes the off stump. Sharma is playing for the ofbreak
short of a length, outside off, and he has played the back-foot drive over extra cover. Difficult shot, but done really well, especially considering the slowness of the wicket
leaves the crease, beaten in the turn, recovers well to place it to the left of third man and comes back for two
short now, punched down to long-off for one
half-appeal for lbw, but angling down from round the stumps. Beats the defensive from Pathan
angling into the pads, worked towards midwicket for one
the extra-cover drive, this time along the ground, and finds the fielder
missed stumping. Pathan has no clue about the legbreak, and jumps out of the crease. Beaten, but Ramdin misses out on the stumping
quicker offbreak outside off, beaten on the cut
straight length ball, played back to Narine. IKP looks tense
wild slog, no feet, beaten outside off
nearly a maiden now. Pathan looks for the pull from outside off. The ball comes on slowly, and squeezes under his bat
Welcome back IKP. Plays out a maiden over. Tries the pull/slog from outside off, and is early into the shot. wonder if he is secretly wishing these hit the stumps
full, driven to long-on, brings back Pathan on strike
full outside off, driven to the left of deep cover, comes back for two
slower through the air, Samuels is bowling smartly after watching IKP struggle with the slowness. He gets a single off the inside edge
Raina gets a four. Slog-sweeps this over midwicket. Perfect length for the shot, a good length delivery
yorker, perfect yorker, Gaylesque. Can't do anything with it
driven down to long-off. They risk the second. Martin's throw catches Pathan miles short

inn2.comm: Irfan Pathan is back. Forget that maiden that he played. He takes a wicket first ball. An old trademark wicket too. Swinging in. On a length. Headed for leg stump. Beats the inside edge. Simmons is caught on the crease. What a start
more swing for him, but this has slid down leg and is called a wide
swing again, shaping in towards off, defended watchfully
short of a length, on off, not much swing because of that shorter length. Defended to cover
perfect, near perfect rather. Fullish, swinging in, hits him in front again, but it is swinging down the leg side
short of a length, down leg, called a wide
more swing, but a wide down leg again
this one is angled across outside off, played with an open face, to the left of point for one
this one starts to swing early, and starts well outside off. Left alone
short of a length, around off, defended square to off
short of a length, on top of off, defended back
big wide down leg, and PP does well to get some hand to it with a full-length dive. Given his height, "full length" doesn't amount to much
short of a length, he plays the short-arm pull with the front leg in the air, in front of square, and past midwicket
elngth ball, starts outside off, angles away, another wide
this starts closer to off, but angling well away, left alone
lovely bowling. Lovely seam here. Upright. it hits leg-stump line, and then nips away. He has to play at it. Beaten
drives at a widish delivery, gets a thick edge to third man for a single
length ball around off, slight shape away, defended
short and wide, and smashed away in front of point
wide down the leg side now
short of a length, middle and off, defended off the back foot
short of a length, outside off, runs this down to third man for a single
this one goes with the angle, pitches around, keeps going, left alone
length ball outside off, pushed to short cover-point
length ball on off, angling away, left alone
short of a length, around off, seams away, beats his attempt at a cut
short of a length, angling in, defended back
lovely shot. Length ball, angling in, driven on the up. He has creamed this between Mithun and mid-on, all along the ground
short of a length, middle and leg, defended just outside off
short of a length, punched off the hip, between mid-on and midwicket
Irfan is screaming in delight. He is loving being back. Seam movement and inside edge for him. Just short of a length, outside off, seams in a touch, Powell pushes away from the body, and plays it on
pitched up outside off, shapes up to swing, but doesn't. Left alone
short of a length, outside off, pushed to cover
length ball on off, clipped away to get off the mark in international cricket
length ball, outside off, no swing, opens the face, keeps it down, guides it between keeper and wide slip
length ball, middle and off, angles away, gets behind it, opens the face, takes a single past point

Mithun doesn't even realise he has got a wicket. What a top delivery. Not sure if it takes the edge, but Mithun doesn't even appeal. Short of a length, outside off, kicks off and moves away a touch. Samuels is beaten all ends up, but the ball swings posthumously, which makes it look like a deflection. Mithun is disappointed he hasn't got the edge. Patel goes up in half appeal. Mithun gets the most pleasant shock of his life when he sees all fielders rushing towards him. Umpire Asnani's finger is up. You needed a crane to lift Samuels out of the ground
starts with the middle, but finds short cover
another good shot, and this time he misses the fielder. Opens the face on the drive, beats short cover to his left and backward point to his right
left alone outside off
defended off the front foot, towards cover
short of a length, angling in, tucked away to square leg
length ball outside off, doesn't swing, left alone
another ball angled across him, and another one left alone
this one looks like it might swing in, but keeps going after pitching. Ramdin is behind it in defence
punched off the back foot, finds cover
half-volley outside off, driven nicely, but can't beat extra cover
Irfan comes back with a maiden of his own. This is a length ball outside off, angling away, and is left alone
from wide of the crease, angling into the pads, worked away for a single
length ball, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
length ball, on off, no movement, driven back to him
short of a length, stays low, and he does well to keep it out
length ball outside off, left alone, bounces short of PP
driven on the up, back at the bowler, Mithun sticks his right leg out to make the save
length ball outside off, driven on the up, to mid-off
fullish, outside off, no swing, driven to mid-off
this is a touch straight, and is clipped off the pads
length ball, on off, angling away, defended to cover
length ball, pitches middle and leg, angling towards off, pushed to mid-off
pushed to the right of mid-off for a single
horrible shot, he has tried to whip this away with the back leg in the air. Misses, but it is headed down leg with the angle
length ball outside off, a tighter drive from Mohammed, finds cover, though
goes across the line again, and is beaten by the angle again. Once again, though, this might have been headed down leg

he succeeds in getting leg-before. Across the line again. Not learning from his earlier mistakes. Mithun bowls straight enough this time, and hits him in front of middle and leg. A better decision from Asnani this time
short of a length, extra bounce, hits Pollard around the waist
short of a length again, hit in the forearm, as Pollard has no clue what to do with this. He is caught between ducking, playing and swaying out of its line
length ball, angling wide, slapped away to deep cover for one
length ball, around off, pushed to point
full, outside off, pushed wide of mid-off for one
length ball on the pads, clipped away for a single
short of a length, on the pads, worked away for a single
length ball outside off, slight angle in, driven to cover
A gift on the pads, gentle half-volley, and flicked away between fine leg and deep square
short of a length, on the pads, worked away for another single
wide down the leg side, and bounces short of Patel, allowing them another extra through the fumble
good delivery, short of a length, outside off, holds its line, beats the edge. Doesn't carry to the keeper
nicely played, pushes this well to the right of third man, and calls for a couple
short of a length, on off, pushed to cover
that looks half-deliberate. The idea is to open the face on this shortish delivery, but it hits the outside half of the bat and goes finer than he intends, which also means it goes for four
length ball on off, no turn, driven to long-on for a single
short of a length, angling away, punched to long-on for one
goes back to push this lenght delivery to long-off for another single
short of a length, pushed to cover
pushed to the right of Raina, but he dives and deflects it to midwicket
nearly played on. Looks to dab a length ball fine, gets the bottom edge, the ball bounces in the crease and headed towards the stumps. Pollard kicks it away in time
quick, into the pads, worked into the leg side for a couple
stays back to a length ball, pushes it down to long-on for one
full, on the pads, pushed to short midwicket

that's a push for a six. A mere chip towards long-off. India think they have got him. The fielder pushes back to the edge of the boundary, but this is so well timed it keeps going and clears him easily
flat and full, defended back
sharp turn, and this is not even flighted. Pitches off, breaks away, beats the edge
length ball outside off, and Ramdin, a compulsive cutter, gets a bottom edge on the shot
fuller, this time he drives down the ground for a single
turning into the pads, can't beat square leg
slightly slower, on off, pushed to cover

that's one of the flatter sixes you'll see. A lovely, clean hit. Just a pick-up off the pads. Over midwicket. And at no point does it go higher than - say - 12-15 feet in the air. It has gone far, seems to have the rope on the full, but the replays show it has gone on the half-volley. Umpire Hill changes his original signal of six to four
length ball, doesn't turn much, Pollard stays back, pushes it to long-on for one
more turn for him, Pollard defends off the front foot

effortless. On the roof. Again seems just a pick-up shot. A length ball, flat, Pollard plants the fornt foot down, and clears long-on with ease. This is getting really interesting. Silence among the Chennai crowd
length ball on leg, picked away for a single
full, on the pads, can't beat square leg

Umpire Asnani strikes again. This is fired into the pads, misses Ramdin's bat, hits him in front of leg, and is angling further down. There is a considerable distance for it to go as Ramdin is on the front foot, but he has been given out lbw. Not sure West Indies players will share a drink with Asnani in the after-tour party
full on off, defended to cover
short of a length, into the pads, worked away for a single
flighted on leg, holds its line, defended back to him
stays low after pitching on a length, worked to the right of midwicket for a single
length ball on off, flat, no turn, defended to cover
turn there, pitches leg, heads towards off, defended off the front foot
length ball on off, defended to cover
length ball on off, not much turn, defended back to him
length ball, off, angling in, defended back
that's slightly short, and gives him room, Russell rocks back and cuts this between cover-point and point
slight drift, in towards off, slight turn away, pushed to cover, and they take the single in 10 strides each
another lovely shot. Just a flick, a push, a chip. And it hits the sight screen. Full enough for Pollard to get under, and he goes over Jadeja's head
on the pads, worked away for a single
length ball, on off, turning away, played towards slip with soft hands
flat legbreak, on off, pushed towards point, they steal the single, and an overthrow
flighted on off, defended back to Rahul Sharma
nicely bowled, on leg, turning away, gets the leading edge as Pollard looks to work this to leg. Safe
flighted on the pads, worked past midwicket for one
short and wide, asking to be hit, and he does so by cutting him to the right of cover-point
length ball outside leg, turning towards stumps, defended
this one turns outside off, punched down to long-off for one
nearly a catch. Stops on him as he looks to drive, it nearly carries to Rahul Sharma at cover
defended solidly off the front foot
width on offer, and he rocks back to cut him in front of square. Brute
length ball on off, turns away slightly, defended to cover
length ball on the pads, pushed to short fine, and they take the single easily
extra bounce on this legbreak, Russell rides the bounce, and punches it to cover-point
slower through the air, flighted on middle and leg, defended to cover
Caribbean written all over this flick. Pitched up on the pads, and he flicks it extravagantly, with the back foot in the air, and it goes 30 rows back into the empty yellow seats
angling down leg, kisses the pad on the way, else it would have been a wide
Russell looks to cut a length ball, which also stays low. Beaten
turn for Jadeja after this pitches leg. Defended back to him
sees him charge, fires this in, Pollard has to defend
amazing shot again. Clean effortless strike straight over Jadeja's head. Reaches fifty with yet another six. This game is not over
angling into the pads, defended
this ball has hit the pad, and hasn't rolled far but the giants steal the leg-bye easily
Kohli misfields at long-off. He has his body behind this, is down on a knee, so this could be a bad bounce, and allows them the second
length ball on the pads, pushed down to long-on for one
defends this flighted delivery solidly
short of a length, on off, punched to cover
nicely driven wide of long-off, all along the ground, buys enough time to come back for the second
tossed up, dips on him a touch, defended solidly
quicker, middle and leg, defended to cover
Six No. 5. Bowled from wide of the crease. Doesn't matter. For this is a half-volley, and Pollard has lofted it over long-on. Easy as Sunday evening. Oh well, it is Sunday evening
length ball on the pads, stays very low, worked into the on side with soft hands, and they steal a couple
outside off, turning away, pushed past point for one
defended off the front foot

Russell has had his sighter, and goes after Tiwary. This is a juicy full toss, on the pads, and he brutalised it over midwicket. Not sure how well can you rip your legbreaks after retiring hurt with cramps in hands
Has he dropped it? Tiwary's reaction suggests so. This legbreak has been ripped. Pitches outside leg, short of a length, and then turns and bounces. Patel fails to collect. Not sure there is an edge
length ball on the pads, defended back to him
pitched up on leg, no turn, hits the pad
tossed up on of off, Paollard strides right forward to block it
nicely bowled, drifts into the pads, turns slightly, towards off, defended back to him

big appeal for lbw as Pollard is beaten on the paddle. This is pitched middle and off, and turning, and Pollard has put in a big stride, so enough doubt I suppose. Bish's gem: "Had it been at the other end, with the other end, he might have been on his way."
short, wide, cut away, in front of square
wide length ball, would have been a wide had he not driven this over point for four
Second drop from Patel in the space of nine balls. Pushes wide at it, gets a healthy edge, but Patel's gloves don't close in time
played back to Kohli, who is angry and does the mock throw. Not sure if he is aiming at the batsman or the keeper
murderous pull, wide of long-on, Pathan does well to keep it in
lovely drive. Brutal. Violent. Length ball outside off, and he beats extra cover on its right and long-off on its left. It takes a couple of seconds to reach the fence I think
punched down to long-off

top-edged for a six. This ball has extra bounce as Russell tries to pull it. He goes ahead with the shot, and clears deep midwicket. In the process, Tiwary, not aware where he is, runs into the boundary board that has hurt his hand
flighted on off, defended back to him
quick legbreak, pitches leg, goes towards off, pushed wide of cover for one
length ball on off, defended for a single, wide of cover again
short of a length, outside off, pushed to point, Jadeja goes for a direct hit to the non-striker's end, allows them the overthrow that brings up Russell's fifty. This is some entertainment
full on the pads, yorks him
length ball, stump to stump, stays low, Russell gets down and behind it to keep it out
turning into the pads, worked away for a single
short of a length, punched down to long-on for one
flighted on middle and leg, defended to leg
short, widish, cut away to deep cover for one
wide down the leg side
driven back to Raina who throws the ball back to Patel, checking if he is awake
length ball on off, pushed wide of cover-point for one
fired into the pads, Pollard jumps out of the crease, and kicks it away
short of a length, punched back to Jadeja
full and straight, defended to cover
and they push long-on with their giant strides here. Hit slightly wide of that man, and they take a second

Gambhir is usually guilty of getting himself run out carelessly but he has pulled one off in the field here. These two have been stealing singles with their giant strides, but this time Pollard has hit this slightly too well to short third, and Gambhir swoops in on it, and throws the middle stump down. Rusell keeps running towards the pavilion
short ball, turns in sharply, played well to the wide of deep midwicket, and comes back for two
length ball outside off, no turn, Pollard pushes at it, and is beaten
the only mis-hit from Pollard, and it is mis-hit so bad that it doesn't carry to long-off. Mithun charges in from the fence, and does well to get his body behind it, and is hit on the half-volley
driven to long-off for one
turning into the pads, beats the defence, but is headed down leg
full on the pads, worked away for an easy single
tossed up on off, defended
full on off, driven to cover
belated appeal from Parthiv, perhaps in excitement that he has held on to one. It turns away from outside off, beats the outside edge by a fair distance
fired into the pads, worked around the corner for a single
Jadeja is getting pummelled. Pollard is toying with him. Another clean, effortless swing to a length ball. Well over long-off it goes
quicker delivery outside off, defended off the front foot
appeal for lbw, it is turning sharply and down the leg side, but you are better off taking your chance with Sudhir Asnani. You never know
length ball, stays back to defend
presses forward to defend this one
goes back to play this length ball to midwicket
bunts this into the on side and takes a sharp single
fullish, on the pads, defended to square leg
nicely bowled, slower through the air, slight turn away, beats Sammy outside off
more turn for him, this time Sammy defends with an open face

Sammy is gone. He never looked comfortable. Drives at him outside off. This is bowled slower through the air. Sammy isn't to the pitch of it, the turn away takes the outside half of the bat. Sliced to point for a simple enough catch
sharp tun into him first ball, the ball lobs into the leg side. They would have appealed loudly if this had gone to hand. Replays show no edge, though
full outside off, defended to cover
full and outside off, driven down to long-off for one
angled into the pads, pushed to midwicket
looks to cut this but is beaten by the lack of bounce
flighted outside off, driven to deep point for one
flat on off, punched to long-off for one
length ball outside off, driven to sweeper-cover for one
Pollard jumps out of the crease, Raina bowls flat, beats him in the flight. Pollard recovers well to drive it to long-off for one
well bowled and well played. Pollard seems to be shaping up for the big one, but the ball dips slightly on him. Seeing he cannot get close to it, he defends it in front of his body
short of a length, punched down to long-off for one
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for a single
nicely bowled, a yorker, lands on the crease. It dips on him too
flatter now, gets turn from outside leg, pushed to long-on for a single
looks to push this away from the body, gets an inside edge on to the pad
slower ball, on the pad, worked behind square for a single
length ball, around off, punched to point
length ball, middle and off, pushed to mid-off
short, doesn't quite come on, ends up playing the cut in front of square
slower ball, well outside off, beats him on the cut
Narine takes the invitation of going down the ground. Length ball on off, he gets under it, and clears extra cover
flighted on off, defended to cover
pitched up on middle and leg, defended watchfully again
and he goes for the big one. This is flighted, and is pitched closer to him, but he is beaten by the turn. Not big tun, mind you
overpitched on the pads, driven to the left of long-on, but Tiwary but he can't take the second

bowled him. The non-turner gets him. Natural variation. Bowled like a legbreak, but it pitches middle and off, and keeps going. Narine plays a defensive shot for the turn. Beaten comprehensively. Off stump pegged back
flighted on the pads, turning towards off, defended watchfully
length ball on leg, slower one too, defended by Pollard
driven to extra cover, Pollard turns down the single, and Roach was gone had Tiwary hit from extra cover
pushed down to long-off, and he refuses the single
big wide down the leg side, and Parthiv Patel does well to collect this one cleanly
nicely bowled, yorker outside off. Pollard can't get under it. Plays it to extra cover
yes he does. This is a low full toss, and he hits it to long-off for one
back of a length, on the stumps, defended off the back foot
short of a length, punched down to long-on for one. He takes the single here
flighted outside off, left alone
tossed up on the pads, pushed to midwicket
short of a length, outside off, defended
pitched up on the pads, worked to leg, Pollard is not interested in a single off the fifth ball
defended watchfully, makes sure Pollard gets strike in the next over
slower ball, on the pads, pushed back to the bowler
another slower ball, mis-hit towards extra cover, Raina makes a diving save to his right
Pollard into the 90s. With another push for a six. A mere flick off the pads, and it clears Rahane easily at cow corner
A slower ball too many. Pollard picks this length ball, and lofts this for a flat six over long-on. That's Pollard's personal best too. Do we have a game on again?
yorker here, outside off, digs it out
digs this yorker out, steals the single to cover
and Pollard has taken the single first ball. Pushes this to leg, and runs through
short of a length, pushed to point, he sends Pollard back. This is behind square and it's Polly's call. But they are all safe for the time being
length ball, middle and off, straight extra cover is alert to the possibility of the single, and denies them that
back of a length, stump to stump, defended back to him
full, near yorker, pushed to short cover
slower short ball, outside off, pushed to point. More than a run a ball required now
pitches outside leg, turns sharply towards the stumps. No run
goes for the sweep, misses out, but it is pitched outside leg
short of a length, stays low, pushed to deep midwicket for one
flighted on middle and off, defended to extra cover
length ball, defended watchfully back
timber. Jadeja is redeeming himself here. Wickets of Sammy and Roach here. Slower through the air, flighted, dips towards middle and off, turns away slightly, beats the edge. Off stump is taken

Kohli has dropped a sitter to allow Pollard his hundred. He is one of the safest Indian fielders around. This is drilled to him at long-on. And through it goes his hands. Head high it was. Pollard takes it gleefully, and celebrates the hundred with the cap off
length ball on the pads, defended to leg
another forward defensive
slower through the air, turning towards off, defended to cover
the fat lady can sit down for a bit. Pollard hits another sing. Pitches middle, on a length, and he goes across the line for a six over wide long-on. Effortless again
length ball on leg, and he takes the single to retain the strike
full on off from over the stumps, Pollard turns down the single to long-off
flat, low trajectory, middle and leg, defended back
mis-hit as he chips, but clears extra cover, and they come back for two
Six No. 10. Sensational hitting. Length ball on the pads, and nonchalantly flicks it over wide long-on for yet another
quick, outside leg, turning towards the stumps, defended
the long-on is up so Pollard goes long-off, and retains strike with the single

Raina strikes first ball. He has some sense of occasion. Pollard is down on his haunches for about five minutes. This is full outside off, he has drilled it down to long-off. Rahane takes a superb catch at the edge of the boundary. A small leap is required, but he makes sure he stays inside the rope. Irfan Pathan comes and shakes Pollard's hand, but Pollard is distraught. Slowly the Indians come to console - well not sure if that is the right emotion - Pollard, whose face is blank
